metadata.name: Remote Access Tool - ScreenConnect Server Web Shell Execution
metadata.comment: Detects potential web shell execution from the ScreenConnect server process.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\screenconnect.service.exe')) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\csc.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects potential web shell execution from the ScreenConnect server process.
